channel.title: Comments on: Centaur, In Streams (Martians Go Home)

item.title: By: Sachem Loman
item.dc:creator: Sachem Loman
item.description: only a fool would compare Matt Talbot to Mike Stipe of REM. There isn't anything there that even remotely compares to each other. CENTAUR's album is a piece of beautiful work; over-looked, and underrated--almost all about Lost love, and quite possibly the loss of a child. This site is as old as yesteryear's crumbs, so...yea. HUM rules. Bands of today suck. Good luck
item.content:encoded: only a fool would compare Matt Talbot to Mike Stipe of REM. There isn’t anything there that even remotely compares to each other. CENTAUR’s album is a piece of beautiful work; over-looked, and underrated–almost all about Lost love, and quite possibly the loss of a child. This site is as old as yesteryear’s crumbs, so…yea. HUM rules. Bands of today suck. Good luck
